name: InnovaGeek
tag_list: innovation, technology, startup, academia, research, social-network, scientific-network, research-blog, research-jobs
overview:
InnovaGeek offers a worldwide shared space to tease innovations and technologies.

InnovaGeek content is focused on innovations and not on players.

Not only oriented for academic research labs it also focus on individual inventors, startups, industrial and technological companies around the world. This also includes students and consulting groups that need to stay in touch to the technology breakthroughs or to locate international know-hows.

Innovators can display pictures and videos to illustrate their technologies and make it easier to find commercial and financial partners. An iPhone application should be publically available in early 2011. InnovaGeek service is free of charge.

InnovaGeek iPhone App link: http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/innovageek/id421138765?mt=8&ls=1#
